fields.desc: The corrosive spray of a black dragon’s breath and the dissolving enzymes secreted by a black pudding deal acid damage.
fields.name: Acid

fields.desc: Blunt force attacks - hammers, falling, constriction, and the like - deal bludgeoning damage.
fields.name: Bludgeoning

fields.desc: The infernal chill radiating from an ice devil’s spear and the frigid blast of a white dragon’s breath deal cold damage.
fields.name: Cold

fields.desc: Red dragons breathe fire, and many spells conjure flames to deal fire damage.
fields.name: Fire

fields.desc: Force is pure magical energy focused into a damaging form. Most effects that deal force damage are spells, including magic missile and spiritual weapon.
fields.name: Force

fields.desc: A *lightning bolt* spell and a blue dragon’s breath deal lightning damage.
fields.name: Lightning

fields.desc: Necrotic damage, dealt by certain undead and a spell such as chill touch, withers matter and even the soul.
fields.name: Necrotic

fields.desc: Puncturing and impaling attacks, including spears and monsters’ bites, deal piercing damage.
fields.name: Piercing

fields.desc: Venomous stings and the toxic gas of a green dragon’s breath deal poison damage.
fields.name: Poison

fields.desc: Mental abilities such as a mind flayer’s psionic blast deal psychic damage.
fields.name: Psychic

fields.desc: Radiant damage, dealt by a cleric’s *flame strike* spell or an angel’s smiting weapon, sears the flesh like fire and overloads the spirit with power.
fields.name: Radiant

fields.desc: Swords, axes, and monsters’ claws deal slashing damage.
fields.name: Slashing

fields.desc: A concussive burst of sound, such as the effect of the *thunderwave* spell, deals thunder damage.
fields.name: Thunder
